ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Wahoo!
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree. Don t camp them, or if you camp them (especially the gorge), do it only because you have important things to do in RL and you can come back on your
ygData.messageBody:
I agree. Don't camp them, or if you camp them (especially the gorge), do it
only because you have important things to do in RL and you can come back on
your computer every 70 minutes (took me 200+ hours total that way). Just go
there from time to time when you move, and you will get lucky once. Once you
have the item from the gorge, then you can camp the others. But I don't
recommand to camp this one. There are better things to do in the world.

Tsin Suchiko
45th rank, Tunare.


-----Original Message-----
From: Worlord [mailto:worlord@...]
Sent: Friday, March 10, 2000 2:34 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Wahoo!


From: Worlord <worlord@...>

I'm sorry people but for the TIME and EFFORT required for the Treant
Fists they are not a good item.
